task.title: Quickstart: run the ordering CLI and print a receipt
task.shortdesc: Run the CLI, enter size/toppings, then quit to print the receipt.

info.p: Input is case-insensitive; the program normalizes the size to uppercase.
Enter one topping per line. Type LIST to display available toppings.
Type X to stop adding toppings and add the pizza to the order.
Enter no or q when prompted to stop ordering and print the receipt.

result.p: The program prints an itemized receipt, then prints tax and final total.
